authors: Fiona Connor For Daily Mail Australia
description: A person has been confirmed dead after a house fire destroyed a residence at Atkinsons Dam west of Brisbane. Flames tore through theÂ home just before 4am this morning.
title: Police say one dead after fire at home west of Brisbane
title_page: Police say one dead after fire at home west of Brisbane | Daily Mail Online
text:
One person has been confirmed dead after a house fire destroyed a residence at Atkinsons Dam west of Brisbane.
Police are on the scene at the Lake St property after flames tore through the Queenslander home during the early hours of this morning.
The fire investigation unit is at the scene working with police to uncover how the person could have been trapped inside and the cause of the devastating flames.
A police representative told Daily Mail Australia that the house is currently too hot to go inside to confirm details of the incident but had been making enquiries to find if the deceased owned the home.
They say the body found is believed to be the only occupant of the house.
Flames tore through the Queenslander home during the early hours of this morning
Fire services arrived at the two-storey property just before 4am this morning.
The Queenslander home was engulfed in flames at that time a fire spokesperson told DMA.
The fire is being treated as suspicious at this stage.
The house is currently too hot to confirm the details of the incident
